titleStmt.title: Bowling Green Branch of the Bank of Kentucky

availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

org.orgName: Bowling Green Branch of the Bank of Kentucky

body.p: Branch of the Bank of Kentucky located in Bowling Green, Kentucky. Seized by the Provisional Government of Kentucky in January 1862. President(s): J. Hines. Cashier(s): Thomas C. Calvert.
Chartered by the Kentucky General Assembly on June 1, 1859. Director(s): .

ab.bibl: Dale Royalty, "Bank of Kentucky" in The Kentucky Encyclopedia, John E. Kleber, ed. (Lexington: University Press of Kentucky, 1992), 47. The Bankers' Magazine, and Statistical Register, vol. XII (August 1862): 163. The Merchants' Bankers' Almanac for 1861 (New York: J. Smith Homans, Jr., Office of the Bankers' Magazine, 1861), 38. The Merchants' Bankers' Almanac for 1864 (New York: J. Smith Homans, Jr., Office of the Bankers' Magazine, 1864), 19.
